pageContext.claim: “Tens of thousands of illegals are being apprehended (captured) at the Border and NOT allowed into our Country. With another President, millions would be pouring in. I am stopping an invasion as the Wall gets built.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump used to tout how much apprehensions had gone down in his presidency, as evidence of his effectiveness on stemming immigration. Now that they are going up, he tries to flip the script and say the rise also shows he is stemming illegal immigration. There is no evidence another president would have been any more or less effective on immigration. Generally, apprehensions have sharply declined since their peak in the early 2000s.
